results.description: Former Leicester City forward Shinji Okazaki leaves Spanish second-tier club Malaga without playing a match - after just 34 days.
results.title: Shinji Okazaki: Ex-Leicester forward leaves Malaga after 34 days

results.description: Celtic sign defenders Lee O'Connor and Jeremie Frimpong on four-year deals.
results.shortTitle: Celtic sign defenders O'Connor and Frimpong
results.title: Celtic sign defensive duo Lee O'Connor and Jeremie Frimpong

results.description: Former Leicester forward Shinji Okazaki signs a one-year deal with Spanish second division side Malaga.
results.shortTitle: Okazaki joins Malaga on one-year deal
results.title: Former Leicester forward Shinji Okazaki joins Malaga on one-year deal

thumbnail.altText: Shinji Okazaki smiles and gives the thumbs-up while playing for Leicester in May

results.description: Scottish forward Jack Harper completes his move from Malaga to Getafe, signing a five-year deal with the La Liga side.
results.shortTitle: Scot Harper joins Getafe in La Liga
results.title: Jack Harper: Scot signs five-year deal at Getafe in La Liga

thumbnail.altText: Jack Harper had a spell with Brighton but could not break into the first team

results.description: Scottish forward Jack Harper scores a late winner as Malaga move back to the top of the Spanish second division with victory over Lugo.
results.shortTitle: Harper scores late winner for Malaga
results.title: Jack Harper: Scottish striker scores late to move Malaga top of the table

results.description: Spanish-born Scot Jack Harper talks about growing up at Real Madrid and choosing to leave the Spanish giants before moving "home" to Malaga.
results.shortTitle: The Scot who walked out on Real Madrid
results.title: Jack Harper: Malaga's Scottish forward who walked out on Real Madrid as a teenager'

results.description: West Ham appoint Mario Husillos as the club's new director of football after the Argentine leaves Spanish side Malaga.
results.shortTitle: Argentine Husillos handed West Ham role
results.title: West Ham: Mario Husillos named new director of football

results.description: Malaga become the first side in Europe's top five leagues to be relegated after the Spanish side are beaten by Levante.
results.title: Levante 1-0 Malaga

results.description: Real Madrid move up into third place in La Liga with victory at bottom side Malaga.
results.title: Malaga 1-2 Real Madrid

results.description: Follow live coverage from Real Madrid's visit to Malaga, plus PSG win the title and Roma face Lazio.
results.shortTitle: Malaga v Real Madrid, PSG win title, plus Rome derby
results.title: European Football: Malaga v Real Madrid, PSG v Monaco & Lazio v Roma

results.description: Barcelona prepare for their Champions League game with Chelsea with a comfortable win at Malaga.
results.shortTitle: FT: Malaga 0-2 Barcelona - Suarez and Coutinho on target
results.title: La Liga live: Malaga 0-2 Barcelona

results.description: Francis Coquelin scores for Valencia - having failed to net for Arsenal in 160 appearances - as they beat Malaga.
results.title: Malaga 1-2 Valencia

results.description: Watford forward Isaac Success, a club record signing when he arrived from Granada for Â£12.5m, has moved on loan for the rest of the season.
results.title: Watford: Isaac Success joins Malaga on loan

results.description: Live text as Real Madrid bid to narrow the 10-point gap on Barcelona when they host Malaga in La Liga.
results.title: La Liga: Real Madrid v Malaga

results.description: Andres Iniesta scores his first goal in over a year as unbeaten La Liga leaders Barcelona see off winless Malaga.
results.title: Barcelona 2-0 Malaga

results.description: Live text as La Liga leaders Barcelona host winless Malaga, while the top two - Napoli and Inter Milan - meet in Italy.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona v Malaga, plus Napoli v Inter updates
results.title: La Liga: Barcelona v Malaga, plus Napoli v Inter Milan

results.description: Atletico Madrid make a winning start in their new stadium as Antoine Griezmann scored the only goal in a La Liga victory over Malaga.
results.title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Malaga

results.description: Swansea City defender Jordi Amat returns to his homeland to join Real Betis on loan.
results.shortTitle: Amat joins Real Betis on season loan
results.title: Jordi Amat: Swansea City defender joins Real Betis on season-long loan

results.description: Everton sign England defender Michael Keane from Burnley for a fee that could rise to a club-record equalling Â£30m.
results.title: Michael Keane: Everton sign England defender from Burnley

results.description: Real Madrid win their first La Liga title since 2012 thanks to a final-day victory at Malaga.
results.title: Malaga 0-2 Real Madrid

thumbnail.altText: Cristiano Ronaldo and Gareth Bale celebrate
